overview:
An energetic, enthusiastic seasoned industry executive in the interactive TV space, articulate leader with over ten years creative lead and cross-functional team management experience in the creation, operation and evolution of interactive TV products geared towards meeting company objectives in delivering sound and compelling user experiences. Effective combination of technical know-how combined with creative graphic design expertise along with understanding hardware & software limitations. Manage user experience teams to develop compelling user interface solutions. Ability to simplify and solve complex problems in high energy situations under tight time constraints. Ability to make decisions and use best judgment to keep product lifecycle moving forward. Excellent communicator with effective and appropriate interpersonal skills in developing solid relationships with diverse groups globally.

Significant accomplishments include the launch of new consumer electronic products for WebTV, TiVo, ReplayTV, MetaTV, iSurfTV, ShowCenter (Digital Media Player), Pinnacle MediaCenter for Pinnacle Systems Germany, AT&T Homezone, Dish Networks, Yahoo!, Movielink and Akimbo and the Netflix Channel experience on Roku.

Specialize in MOBILE / TV / SOCIAL / CLOUD
